page.title: 16Shopping in Kettering N.E.
page.content: Grange shopping precinct has a sub- Post Office and it is possible to purchase groceries,vegetables, meat, flowers and newspapers at the various shops. A hair-dressing salon, a launderette and a fish and chip shop are well used. Of the 54 people interviewed just 56% live on Grange estate showing that the shops are well used by people from Avondale estate too. 76% use the shops three times or more each week, 6% twice, 20% once. Each week 46% go to town once, 46% more, 8% never. Some Weekley residents may drive or walk to Grange shops or town or use their own Post Office and general store. Older folks go into the shop each day in order to talk with someone. About half of the trade is casual as a result of people passing through the village and there being easy parking.
